name: Tesco plc

interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Tesco serves millions of customers every week so we are interested in a wide range of issues and policy areas that affect the way we serve our customers. Alongside our core purpose of 'serving shoppers a little better every day', we are committed to creating a business where colleagues can get on, whatever their background; to helping our customers make healthier choices and enjoy good quality, sustainable products, at affordable prices; and to helping make sure no food that could be eaten is wasted, anywhere in our supply chain.
